entrances.Death Mountain Summit -> Mountain Bombab: Field Near Lake Inside Fence Grotto
entrances.Desert Colossus -> Desert Colossus Grott: Field Far West Castle Town Grotto
entrances.Hyrule Field -> Field Kakariko Grotto: Field Near Lake Outside Fence Grotto
entrances.Castle Town -> Castle Town Bombchu Shop: Castle Town Man in Green House

Death Mountain Crater (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #Ganondorf's bane#.

Death Mountain Crater (Rock Grotto).text: They say that #a green spark trail# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

Death Mountain Trail (Biggoron).text: They say that #a conquered citadel# hoards #a wooden ward#.

Desert Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #fishing in maturity# bestows #a Band-Aid#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #a common coin#.

Gerudo Valley (Waterfall).text: They say that #an ailment antidote# can be found at #Kakariko Village#.

Goron City (Maze).text: They say that #the goddess of the sand# hoards #a little love#.

Goron City (Medigoron).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a banana# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Hyrule Castle (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a song of dancing Gorons#.

Hyrule Castle (Rock Wall).text: They say that #an explosive container# can be found at #the Graveyard#.

Hyrule Castle (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

Hyrule Field (Castle Moat Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Like Like's metal meal#.

Hyrule Field (Hammer Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

Hyrule Field (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the test of thieves# hoards #an archery enabler#.

Hyrule Field (Rock Grotto).text: They say that deep under #the lake#, beyond the currents, hides #a tool for unlocking#.

Kakariko (Potion Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #big bucks#.

Kokiri Forest (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #ghost hunters# will be rewarded with #a blue gem#.

Kokiri Forest (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the house of the dead# hoards #the temple traveler#.

Kokiri Forest (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a blue spark trail#.

Kokiri Forest (Storms).text: They say that at the back of #the Graveyard#, there is #a deep forest#.

Lake Hylia (Lab).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a common coin#.

Lake Hylia (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

Lake Hylia (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the goddess of the sand# is on the way of the hero.

Lost Woods (Bridge).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a broken heart#.

Lost Woods (Rock Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a dungeon atlas#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Maze Lower).text: They say that #mice bombs# can be found at #Temple of Time#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a yellow gem# can be found at #Goron City#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Saria).text: They say that #an immense cavern# hoards #fireproof fabric#.

Temple of Time (Left).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

Temple of Time (Right).text: They say that deep in #the forest#, shadows guard a chest containing #big bucks#.

Temple of Time (Right-Center).text: They say that an #amphibian feast# yields #a burnable barrier#.

Zoras Domain (Mweep).text: They say that #a conquered citadel# hoards #a blue gem#.

Zoras Fountain (Fairy).text: They say that #thieves# train within #a vast lake#.

Zoras Fountain (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a flute#.

Zoras River (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a starter slasher# can be found at #the Market#.

Zoras River (Plateau).text: They say that using a hammer #in the Crater# opens the path to the #Treasure Chest Game#.

Zoras River (Waterfall).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

4.Hyrule Field -> Field Kakariko Grotto: Field Near Lake Outside Fence Grotto
